title: 10 Game-Changing Tools You should Bookmark Now😎🔖
intro: Welcome to my another article. In this article, I have compiled a list of the most useful tools for you which increases your productivity and save your time🚀⏱ .
contents: Hi Devs👋
Let's get started 👇
1. esProc SPL

esProcSPL is an open-source, next-generation data processing language with rich library functions and powerful syntax built using Java that integrates with SQL databases and supports advanced analytics, and parallel processing.
With esProcSPL, you can effortlessly transform and analyze massive datasets, uncover hidden patterns and trends, and derive actionable insights from your data.
2. Intools
Intools is one of the best all-in-one tool site which provides various tools in various categories like developer tools, component tools, UI tools, Job tools and many more.
3. Jitter
Jitter is a fast and simple motion design tool. It creates professional animated content. You can use it to design on-brand animated UIs, videos, social media posts, websites, apps, logos and more.
4. Landingfolio

Landingfolio is an extensive component library for Tailwind, Webflow and Figma. It provides the best landing page designs, templates, component and more on the web. It contains 850+ components, some are free to use and some components require membership to use.
5. LambdaTest

LambdaTest is a cloud-based cross-browser testing platform that lets you test web applications on over 2000 different browsers, operating systems, and devices. LambdaTest allows you to test cross-browser compatibility both manually and automatically.
6. Vexus

Vexus provides high quality design mockups, plugins and design assets. These mockups are created using spine 3D. These mockups enable you to customise 100% of the scene mock in a 3D enviorment using Spline's easy to use interface. Create a free Spline account, import the mockups and start customising.
7. CodeMyUI

CodeMyUI website is a collection of web design and Ui snippets code that you can freely use in your project. Various categories like Page elements, Design elements, Javascript snippets etc are also included.
8. Responsively
Responsively is an opensource and web developer's must have dev-tool. With this tool you can develop responsive web apps 5x faster!
9. Metatags

Metatags.io is a tool that generates tags for any website and also you can edit and experiment with your content and then preview how your webpage will look on Google, Facebook, Twitter, and other social media platforms.
10. Frontend Dogma
Frontend Dogma is also an all-in one tool which provides various front-end tools for different categories like Accessibility, Code, Network, SEO/SEM, Browser testing, Colors, Content etc.
Thanks for reading this article ❤.If you found this article helpful, please consider giving it 💖🦄🔥🙌
